issue.title: Orbit view controller movement swapped for X/Y hotkeys

content.raw:
So to resolve this issue one needs to align the hotkey + mouse motion with the camera frame instead of the world frame? 

i.e. when the two aren't aligned the motion should be along the axis but in a direction calculated wrt to the camera instead of the axes?
